1.Pros: It is a job that one can easily adapt to if one puts in the necessary amount of work. It is a great for anyone in college or anyone who is trying to save money.
1.Cons: There are not a lot of opportunities for advancement. I only received a 25 cent raise over 2 years. Also, the work can at times get very monotonous.

2.Cons: there are no downsides to working here.

3.Pros: Plenty of work hours, good people
3.Cons: Management was horrible at helping crew.

4.Pros: Great learning environment and plenty of opportunity to move up.

5.Pros: working in food service was very humbling. I definitely recommend working in food service once in your life. It's also a good way to work on communication skills
5.Cons: Customers can get annoying and managers will power trip. There are times when customers will be wrong, but you can't say anything and will have to roll with the punches.
